title: Regarding Placements at PES University
content:
What was the average and median CTC for PESU students from 2023 batch, in particular for CSE? 

I saw some reports/articles suggesting it is around 17-18 LPA and in the presentation shown during the 1st round of counselling, average CTC was mentioned as 17.99 LPA but some people are saying it is around 12-14 LPA, can someone please throw some light into the actual reality?

comments.body: This question has been answered before, but the gist of it is that it is fairly accurate. The average is around 17-18 and the median is around 12-13, which is what I think people are referring to by the other stat. There is also an *incomplete* sheet somewhere on this sub about the placements this year.
Is there anyway to get the complete sheet??
Yea it'd be very helpful if we got the complete sheet about the placements of 2023 batch
What are the placements for ece??
[2023 Placements](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1a-eaEBcTeOJESck3f8W_I3uJqRRiEc_7d5O1Xc3nIUg/edit?usp=sharing) (You can switch between dream, tier1,tier2 etc in the spreadsheet)
